oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Benjamin E. Carmichael correspondence with Dr. Herbert Wey, 1965 February 26
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Carmichael, Benjamin E.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Letter from Chattanooga Public Schools superintendent Benjamin Carmichael to Dr. Herbert Wey, education professor at University of Miami, discussing preparation measures for desegregation.
